dmca.title: DMCA letter
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Marco Navalesi [mailto:navalesi@gmail.com] 
Sent: Thursday, May 24, 2007 2:24 AM
To: Response, Legal
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: DMCA letter

 

Dear Sir,
I'm writing you acting on behalf of Miss Marketa Belonoha 
http://www.marketa4you.com/
Legal info:
http://www.marketa4you.com/legal.html
Please see the attached DMCA letter about: 
http://www.marketabelonoha.org/

Thanks in advance for your cooperation.
Best Regards

Marco Navalesi

-------------

DMCA Notification of Infringement Letter 

24 th  May 2007 

The Planet.com Intenret Services, Inc. 1333 Stemmons Fwy., Ste 100, Dallas, Texas 75207 Mr. Andrea Almeida Legal-response@theplanet.com Fax 001 214 782 7756 To Whom It May Concern, I am writing to you to avail myself of my rights under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA). This letter is a Notice of Infringement as authorized in
